ComicInfo.Characters: Chyia [previously Fawn] (first appearance, sister of Moot)
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T16:04:28 [Issue ID 4000-25151] urn:comicvine:4000-25151 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 20:53:14. [Issue ID 39582]
ComicInfo.Title: When the Dead Walk ... and the Living Don't; The Key To Survival
ComicInfo.Summary:
When the Dead Walk ... and the Living Don't: Fawn (now seen to really be Chyia, Moot's sister) enlists Morgana's aid. Owt and Milos (revived by "God") seek Morgana, while the colonists encounter a monster.
The Key To Survival: Daro and Pomru and two others fight enemy troops on a moon of Fergusson as the earth command plans to turn Fergusson into a star to slow the enemy advance on earth.
ComicInfo.Writer: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,John Ostrander,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,John Ostrander

ComicInfo.Inker: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Doug Rice,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Doug Rice
ComicInfo.Colorist: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Kathryn Mayer,Rick Taylor,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Kathryn Mayer,Rick Taylor
ComicInfo.Letterer: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Kathryn Mayer,Steve Haynie,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Kathryn Mayer,Steve Haynie
